Title: Principles of statistical data analysis
Abstract: © 2016 by Taylor & Francis Group, LLC.Imagine a lecture theatre of 100 students. I give half of them tea to drink and the other half coffee; the 50 who receive coffee all die. Which statistical test should I use to determine whether the coffee was poisoned? The answer is ‘none’, as the answer is obvious. But what if I decided to try to improve my teaching, as 10% of students fall.
